post_text:
This long weekend is the perfect time to create your MASTERPIECE!!!!! Square 1 Art information was sent home a few weeks ago. Remember, ALL art work that is submitted gets a FREE (that's correct, free, no strings attached) sheet of stickers. No purchase necessary to receive these. Here are a few things to keep in mind:
-Students, parents, siblings or ANYONE can submit their artwork
-Artwork must be submitted to teachers by Friday, Feb. 23
-You can create your masterpiece on your own paper. It must be 8.5 X 8.5. You can pick up an extra form in the office and glue your artwork to the form
-Bold classic markers, tempera paint, or paper collage are recommended
-DO: center drawing and fill entire art paper, ensure borders are even and 1 inch wide, color dark, make it colorful, keep important details away from edge
-DO NOT: create off centered drawings, have uneven borders, put name close to edge
HAVE FUN!!!!!!!

It's a great day to create your MASTERPIECE!!!!! Square 1 Art information was sent home last week. Remember, ALL art work that is submitted gets a FREE sheet of stickers. No purchase necessary to receive these. Here a few things to keep in mind:
-Students, parents, siblings or anyone can submit their artwork
-Artwork must be submitted to teachers by Thursday, Feb. 23
-You can create your masterpiece on your own paper. It must be 8.5 X 8.5. You can pick up an extra form in the office and glue your artwork to the form
-Bold classic markers, tempera paint, or paper collage are recommended. Crayons and colored pencils are NOT bold enough to create quality transfers.
-DO: center drawing and fill entire art paper, ensure borders are even and 1 inch wide, color dark, make it colorful, keep important details away from edge
-DO NOT: create off centered drawings, have uneven borders, put name close to edge
HAVE FUN!!!!!!!
